response.raw_message_text:
{
  "risk_factors": [
    ["Age and Gender", "medium", "At 19 and female, she is young which can be associated with higher risk behaviors, but being female provides some protective factors relative to males."],
    ["Ethnicity", "low", "Her Hispanic identity is not directly linked to recidivism risk and should not be overinterpreted."],
    ["Arrest History", "medium", "Three prior arrests, even without convictions, indicate a history with the justice system that raises concern."],
    ["Physical Characteristics", "low", "Her height and weight are not relevant factors in predicting recidivism."],
    ["Marital and Living Status", "medium", "Living alone without the stabilizing effect of a partner or extended family network may contribute to risk."],
    ["Educational Attainment", "medium", "Holding a high school diploma without pursuing further education can limit opportunities, representing a moderate risk factor."],
    ["Employment History", "high", "Not having held any jobs during the past year is a significant risk factor, as stable employment is a protective factor against recidivism."],
    ["Drug Use History", "low", "No drug use in the past four years reduces risk related to substance abuse."],
    ["Mental Health", "high", "Experiencing persistent low mood ("almost down in the dumps" most of the past month) strongly suggests depression, which is linked to higher risk of recidivism."],
    ["Family Background", "low", "Growing up with both biological parents in a seemingly stable household is a protective factor even though an urban setting can introduce some risk."],
    ["Religious Beliefs", "low", "Belief that God influences personal events can be associated with positive coping mechanisms and thus is a low risk factor"]
  ],
  "prediction": "YES",
  "confidence": 65
}

risk_factors: At 19 and female, she is young which can be associated with higher risk behaviors, but being female provides some protective factors relative to males.
Her Hispanic identity is not directly linked to recidivism risk and should not be overinterpreted.
Three prior arrests, even without convictions, indicate a history with the justice system that raises concern.
Her height and weight are not relevant factors in predicting recidivism.
Living alone without the stabilizing effect of a partner or extended family network may contribute to risk.
Holding a high school diploma without pursuing further education can limit opportunities, representing a moderate risk factor.
Not having held any jobs during the past year is a significant risk factor, as stable employment is a protective factor against recidivism.
No drug use in the past four years reduces risk related to substance abuse.
Experiencing persistent low mood ("almost down in the dumps" most of the past month) strongly suggests depression, which is linked to higher risk of recidivism.
Growing up with both biological parents in a seemingly stable household is a protective factor even though an urban setting can introduce some risk.
Belief that God influences personal events can be associated with positive coping mechanisms and thus is a low risk factor

prompt.system:
You are a highly experienced criminal justice risk assessment expert
employing advanced statistical and judicial knowledge.
prompt.user:
You are a criminal risk assessment expert. Step back, take a deep breath and carefully think step by step to assign a relative weight [low, medium, high] to each risk factor before using them to collectively predict 3-year rearrest recidivism:
The person is a 19-year-old female who identifies herself as Hispanic. She has been arrested 3 times but has not been convicted. She is 5 feet 0 inches and weighs 145 lbs. She has never been married and is currently living alone. She has a high school diploma and is not enrolled in college. She has held no jobs during the year. She has not used any drugs in the past four years and most of the time during the past month she has felt so down in the dumps that nothing could cheer her up. At a young age, she lived with both of her biological parents in a household of size 5, in an urban area. She considers that God has something to do with what happens to her personally.

After your analysis, you must respond ONLY with a JSON object in exactly this format, with no additional text:

{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("factor1", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ("factor2", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ...
  ],
  "prediction": "YES" or "NO",
  "confidence": number between 0 and 100
}
